CHAT.comment: JOSEPH SCHEIDLER, ANDREW SCHOLBERG, TIMOTHY MURPHY, AND THE PRO-LIFE ACTION LEAGUE, INC., Petitioners v. NATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR WOMEN, INC., ET AL.; and OPERATION RESCUE, Petitioner v. NATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR WOMEN, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF FAY CLAYTON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
